name: Rage Ball (Tesh)
description:
Bloody the court in this insane action arcade game where you must make all the balls in the hoop as you battle through obstacles and relentless enemies.

-

Each level has a certain number of balls that must be shot into the hoop but there are many obstacles and challenges to this from relentless enemies and many obstacles you must break your way through to win the game!

-

Each level increases by 5 balls and 5 enemies plus bigger maps with many more obstacles.

-
